result.purpose: Responsible for defining models and types related to notification services, including push notifications and constants used in the domain.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, organizing related models and constants for the notification domain in a cohesive manner.

internal/domains/notification/models/apn.purpose: Defines push notification types for Apple Push Notification service (APNs).

internal/domains/notification/models/con.purpose: Defines constants used in the notification domain.

internal/domains/notification/models/mes.purpose: Defines a message model for post notifications with methods for timestamp and idempotency key generation.

internal/domains/notification/models/pus.purpose: Defines models for push notification handling including recipient filters and payload structures.
